thread.title: Emotional tributes paid to George Michael at Brits
thread.title_full: Emotional tributes paid to George Michael at Brits - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Emotional tributes paid to George Michael at Brits
text:
George Michael Credit: PA Former Wham! bandmate Andrew Ridgeley, accompanied by Pepsi and Shirley, have paid tribute to George Michael at the Brits.
Ridgeley described his friend as "a supernova in a ferment of shining stars" in an emotional speech honouring the star.
Fighting to hold back the tears Shirley added: "George was like a brother to me. And will always be ..."
She said: "His wonderful way with words spoke to everyone. And his beautiful voice will live on forever as a gift to us all."
Play video Coldplay's Chris Martin also played a musical tribute to Michael with a beautiful rendition of the late star's 'A Different Corner'.
